HEROES

  • {{hero.name}}
Select a Hero to Edit None {{hero}}
import { Component, OnDestroy, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {Hero} from '../app/Models/hero' import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Store } from '@ngrx/store'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { constructor( private store: Store<{heroList:{Heroes: Hero[]}}> ) {console.log("app comp init")} heroes: Observable<{Heroes: Hero[]}>; updateChosen: boolean = true; selectedHero: string = ""; ngOnInit(): void { this.heroes = this.store.select('heroList') } alertm() { console.log("alert") } ngOnDestroy(): void { console.log("destroyed app component") } }
